programme.title: The Ashes: Australia's Best Days
programme.desc: A look back at the first day of the First Test in 2005, which was staged at Lord's, and saw the Australian bowlers battle back after their side had been dismissed cheaply. England looked to have had the upper hand after they bowled the Aussies out for just 190, but subsequently suffered at the hands of Glenn McGrath, Brett Lee and Shane Warne as they ended the day on 92/7.(n)

programme.title: Live Big Bash Cricket
programme.desc: Adelaide Strikers v Hobart Hurricanes. Coverage of the concluding match in the third round of fixtures, which takes place at the Adelaide Oval. The Hurricanes finished as runners-up to Perth Scorchers last season, while the Strikers were eliminated in the round-robin stage after winning just two of the seven matches they completed.(n)

programme.title: Sporting Greats

programme.title: USPGA Championship Golf
programme.desc: The official film of the 2013 Major, which was held at the Oak Hill Country Club in Pittsford, New York, where Jason Dufner went on to claim the title. This was the first Major success of the American's career, with his previous best performance being a fourth-placed finish at the US Open.(n)

programme.title: USPGA Championship Golf
programme.desc: A chance to see day four of the Major from Valhalla Golf Club in Louisville, Kentucky, where this year's champion was decided. Having previously led on day two at last year's tournament, and remained in contention on day three, American Jason Dufner carded a two-under-par 68 in the final round, which proved to be enough to claim his maiden Major title, finishing with a two-stroke lead over compatriot Jim Furyk.(n)

All these Nick haters what a great guy as met him and chatted with him. He is also a real pro. (bemused 2:32pm Tue 22 Apr (Guinea Perhaps someone should tell nick that this was worth £1 1s not £1 as he stated today!!! (MumC 2:34pm Tue 15 Apr (One that I watch Along with Pointless this is the only other programme I watch (savant 3:00pm Mon 7 Apr (so annoying The finalist selects one of the offers and find they have been bluffing and know nothing! (bemused 8:59pm Thu 20 Mar (Greedy contestants This quiz encourages people to be greedy. It really puts me off from watching the show. (Ellenb34 8:18pm Tue 25 Feb (perfection game show Been in audience for recordings. A perfect relaxing show. We watch every day and record if not at home. (Wizzy 10:32pm Wed 19 Feb (General The quiz format is good etc, it's Nick himself who makes it look bad and me not want to watch, can't stand the bloke, he's boring, his voice is annoying, I'm sure he gets bored himself, of himself. He's nothing compared to for e.g. Bradley Walsh on 'The Chase'. Nothing is as ad as 'Deal or no deal' though, it's the most pointless and ridiculous show to have been broadcast. (Leonard 3:51pm Tue 18 Feb (Enough With another 12 episodes of Series 4 still to be shown, they have decided in their wisdom to repeat Series 2 for a second time. I will not be watching until new episodes are screened. (Fed-up 4:00pm Wed 12 Feb (Usual turn off I can only watch this for three minutes at a time because of his continually repeated catch phrase (Usual Critic 11:00pm Fri 7 Feb (Conmen Cannot stand it, and they should not be allowed to join the person in question if they don't change a question and then walk away with normally more than half the prize money!! Like that fool did today!! What a greedy cheek!!! Hope you sleep well at night!! (Mbiri 3:48pm Wed 5 Feb (Unlucky Today's final choice of subjects for the second contestant was very difficult. After scoring a maximum in the earlier three rounds,he only got one right in the final which did not surprise me. (Out of Touch 6:47pm Mon 20 Jan (ersatz coffee ersatz coffee was made from acorns duringWW2 see Wikepedia,deemed false,episode date 20/01/13.. (gordo 4:14pm Mon 20 Jan (Coincidence Seems strange that once again (in particularly this week) a contestant has failed on one question in the final. That is the last question checked by Nick, despite the position on the board. Does Nick know the answers in advance and deliberately guide the contestants to that final answer. (Observant 3:30pm Fri 13 Dec (Excellent I dont understand all the negative comments, this is an excellently designed quiz format, and much better than say Pointless. As an viewer you can join in easily with each round, there's a high number of answerable questions, and the usual suspects element is a nice twist. Sure Nick is a bit monotonous, but wouldnt you be after a while? Why has it been taken off, bring it back to the 2.15pm slot after Doctors where we love it!! (Marcusian 6:38pm Tue 19 Nov Perfection is also on... programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: An explorer stumbles upon evidence that an American Civil War battleship, which was laden with treasure when it sank without trace, has ended up somewhere in the Sahara. However, he is deflected from his mercenary quest to find the hoard by an encounter with a tenacious doctor, whose battle to stop the spread of a deadly disease could be linked to his own mission. Adventure, starring Matthew McConaughey, Penelope Cruz and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: An alien child from a dead world is raised on Earth, and grows up keeping his origins and extraordinary abilities a secret. He is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe.(n)

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: A band of samurai is betrayed by a ruthless warlord who murders the warriors' master and banishes them from their homeland. They receive fresh hope in the shape of a mysterious former slave, who leads them into battle against monstrous and magical enemies as they seek to reclaim their former status. Fantasy adventure, starring Keanu Reeves and Hiroyuki Sanada.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A scientist and four members of his crew develop superhuman powers after exposure to cosmic radiation on a mission to study an energy storm in space. Unfortunately, one of them chooses to use his new-found abilities for evil purposes, compelling the others to join forces to stop him. Sci-fi comic-book adventure, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis and Julian McMahon.(n)

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: The alien thunder god returns to Earth when a powerful weapon from the dawn of time is discovered. The device attracts the attention of an old enemy of his people, who intends to use it to plunge the universe into darkness - and to stop him, Thor must form an uneasy alliance with his treacherous brother Loki. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston and Natalie Portman.(n)

programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: A rift between dimensions opens up at the bottom of the Pacific ocean, and Earth is invaded by gigantic alien monsters. Equally massive robots, each controlled by two human pilots with their minds linked, are created to fight back against the creatures. Sci-fi adventure, starring Charlie Hunnam, Rinko Kikuchi and Idris Elba.(n)

Superhero adventure sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston and Natalie Portman.(n)

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Two sisters who have not spoken in years bury the hatchet when they learn their mother and father have split up. They plan to push their parents back together by organising a family Christmas celebration in the house they grew up in. The only problem is that someone else lives there now. Family drama, starring real-life sisters Carly and Britt McKillip.(n)

programme.title: Snow Buddies
programme.desc: Five talking puppies get trapped inside an ice-cream truck that ends up in the wilds of Alaska. But as they try to make their way home, they meet a husky pup who asks them to make up a team to compete in a two-day dog-sled race. Family adventure sequel, starring Richard Karn and Cynthia Stevenson, with the voices of James Belushi and Whoopi Goldberg.(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: A workaholic father tries to make up for his perpetual absence from home by promising to buy his son a hugely popular action figure for Christmas - little realising every other father in town has the same idea. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Jake Lloyd, Rita Wilson, Robert Conrad and Phil Hartman.(n)

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men
programme.desc: Two cantankerous elderly neighbours have known each other a lifetime, and to liven up their otherwise dull existences they continually trade insults - but the arrival of an attractive widow in the area gives them real grounds to argue. Comedy, starring Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, Ann-Margret, Burgess Meredith and Daryl Hannah.(n)

programme.title: Jack Frost
programme.desc: A rock musician who realises he is spending too much time away from his family is killed in a car accident while travelling home for the festive season. The following year his spirit takes on the form of a snowman, made by his son, allowing them to spend one last Christmas together. Fantasy drama, starring Michael Keaton, Kelly Preston, Joseph Cross and Mark Addy.(n)

programme.title: New Year's Eve
programme.desc: Various New Yorkers wrestle with personal and romantic challenges in their lives on the last night of the year, including a record company executive determined to make a fresh start and a dying man who wants to join the traditional Times Square festivities one last time. Comedy drama, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Halle Berry, Sarah Jessica Parker and Zac Efron.(n)

programme.desc: An American householder is dismayed when his plans for a traditional festive family holiday are thrown into complete disarray by a succession of annoying neighbours and long-lost relatives, who turn up on his doorstep offering their own brand of Christmas cheer. Comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Randy Quaid, Diane Ladd, Juliette Lewis, Miriam Flynn, Johnny Galecki and William Hickey.(n)

programme.title: The Lone Ranger Unmasked
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of the Western from the director of Pirates of the Caribbean, starring Armie Hammer and Johnny Depp.(n)

programme.title: You've Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rivals in the bookshop business fall in love over the internet, unaware they know and dislike each other in the real world. While things remain frosty in person, the pair's anonymous online relationship continues to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan, Greg Kinnear, Parker Posey and Dabney Coleman.(n)

programme.title: Alien Autopsy
programme.desc: Video dealer Ray and his friend Gary stumble onto what seems to be footage of an alien autopsy and plan to sell it. But when the film is destroyed, they resort to re-creating the incident in their kitchen. Comedy, based on the infamous 1995 hoax, starring Anthony McPartlin, Declan Donnelly, Omid Djalili, Bill Pullman and Harry Dean Stanton.(n)

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: A sixtysomething confirmed bachelor finally decides to settle down with his much younger girlfriend. He and three friends decide to mark the occasion by reliving their wild youth with a trip to Las Vegas - but they find that both the city and each other have changed since their glory days. Comedy, starring Michael Douglas, Robert De Niro, Morgan Freeman and Kevin Kline.(n)

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally
programme.desc: A man and a woman with different attitudes to life meet by chance and develop a close and long-lasting friendship. But over time, a mutual sexual attraction begins to develop and threatens to ruin their relationship - raising the question whether men and women can ever really be just friends. Romantic comedy, starring Billy Crystal and Meg Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues
programme.desc: Arrogant newsreader Ron Burgundy's career is rescued from a drunken slump by an executive for a new 24-hour news channel. Reassembling his team of sidekicks, he swiftly rises from the network's graveyard to become its biggest star with a run of ludicrously sensationalist broadcasts. Comedy sequel, starring Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Paul Rudd and Steve Carell.(n)

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A Nascar racing champion has everything he could want - until an arrogant French rival seizes the title from him, and his wife runs off with his best friend. Forced to move back in with his parents, the downhearted driver faces a battle to rebuild his shattered self-confidence and return to the track. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen.(n)

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: Drinking buddies Phil and Stu try to help their troubled friend Alan get his life in order, only to stumble into another bizarre misadventure. The Mob have taken Alan's brother hostage and to free him, they have to track down manic gangster Mr Chow, who has escaped from a Thai prison. Comedy sequel, starring Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Last Vegas

Comedy sequel, starring Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Paul Rudd and Steve Carell.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook double-crosses his partners in crime, a betrayal that leaves their friend and mentor dead. One year later, they regroup and come up with a daring plan to exact revenge on the traitor and reclaim their ill-gotten gains. Crime thriller inspired by the 1969 movie, starring Mark Wahlberg, Charlize Theron, Edward Norton, Seth Green and Donald Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: American soldiers are sent into war-torn Mogadishu in 1993 on a routine search and capture operation. Learning some of their compatriots have been shot down, they feel compelled to mount a perilous rescue attempt - one that descends into all-out conflict with heavily armed Somalians. Ridley Scott's fact-based drama, starring Josh Hartnett, Eric Bana, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore, Ewen Bremner and William Fichtner.(n)

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: An American cargo ship sets a dangerous course around the coast of Somalia, while inland, four men are pressed into service as pirates by the local warlords. The captain is taken hostage when the raiding party hijacks the vessel, resulting in a tense five-day crisis. Fact-based thriller, starring Tom Hanks and Barkhad Abdi.(n)

programme.title: American Hustle
programme.desc: A conman is caught in the act by the FBI, but a maverick agent offers him the chance to escape prison by assisting in a sting operation. The hustler finds himself involved in a scheme to bring down the corrupt, Mafia-affiliated politician, only to find his own ex-wife plotting revenge. Crime drama set in the 1970s, starring Christian Bale, Amy Adams, Bradley Cooper and Jennifer Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: A convicted child-killer of towering height and massive build is condemned to death row, but astonishes the guards with his good nature and miraculous healing powers. They believe the gentle giant is incapable of crime, and emotions run high as they realise there is no hope of overturning his death sentence. Supernatural drama, based on a novel by Stephen King, starring Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse and Harry Dean Stanton.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A foul-tempered Victorian miser who hates the festive season is visited on Christmas Eve by a series of ghosts. The spirits intend to make him mend his wicked ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future will hold for him if he does not change for the better. Animated fantasy based on Charles Dickens' novel, featuring motion-captured performances by Jim Carrey and Gary Oldman.(n)

programme.title: Stitch! The Movie
programme.desc: Animation following the further adventures of the little alien, as a host of his fellow experimental creatures arrive on Earth. However, their chaotic efforts to make themselves at home are threatened by the evil Captain Gantu, who is hot on their heels and determined to capture them. With the voices of Chris Sanders, Daveigh Chase, Ving Rhames and David Ogden Stiers.(n)

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: A cropduster longs to be a racing plane, but is hamstrung by a fear of heights. With the aid of a veteran flyer, he learns to conquer his phobia and compete against some of the world's greatest flyers in a round-the-world race. Animated adventure spin-off from Pixar's Cars, with the voices of Dane Cook, Teri Hatcher and Stacy Keach.(n)

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Student creatures Mike and Sulley attend university to learn how to be scary, but their rivalry gets them both kicked off the course. The monstrous duo must learn how to work together if they are to realise their dreams of terrifying children. Animated comedy prequel, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal and Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Party Central
programme.desc: Monsters University animated short, in which Mike and Sulley return to the college to see how their old friends are doing, and help them to throw a wild party. With the voices of John Goodman and Billy Crystal.(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams.(n)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: A video game villain grows tired of always being the bad guy, and ventures into other games in search of the chance to be a hero, unwittingly causing chaos in the process. When a deadly threat to the entire arcade appears, it falls to him to set things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of John C Reilly, Sarah Silverman and Jane Lynch.(n)

programme.title: Toy Story That Time Forgot
programme.desc: The toys are taken to visit a friend of their new owner, where they encounter a range of dinosaur action figures with a tenuous grip on reality. Short animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen and Kristen Schaal.(n)

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: A jealous string-pulled cowboy doll's status as his owner's favourite plaything is threatened by the arrival of a charismatic hi-tech astronaut figure, who refuses to believe he is simply a toy. However, the rivals are forced to work together when they are left stranded in the outside world. Pixar animated adventure, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles and Jim Varney.(n)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: Cowboy doll Woody is stolen by an unscrupulous toy collector, who knows he is worth a fortune as a collectible, prompting fearless Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear to lead a daring across-town mission to rescue him. However, Woody is tempted to spend his life languishing in the safety of a museum rather than face the prospect of his owner growing up. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Student creatures Mike and Sulley attend university to learn how to be scary, but their rivalry gets them both kicked off the course. The monstrous duo must learn how to work together if they are to realise their dreams of terrifying children. Animated comedy prequel, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal and Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: A buccaneer and a blacksmith commandeer a British ship and set sail in pursuit of a pirate captain who has kidnapped a colonial governor's daughter. However, their quarry and his crew are under a curse that turns them into living skeletons - and makes them impossible to kill. Swashbuckling fantasy adventure, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Geoffrey Rush, Jack Davenport and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptune's crown. However, the missing diadem has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke and Clancy Brown, Scarlett Johansson and a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff.(n)

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: A scientist believes he has saved the world from his invention, a machine that accidentally turned water into food. However, he learns the device is still active and has created a race of food/animal hybrids that he must stop from running wild across the world. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan.(n)

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: A woman raises her six-year-old daughter to believe that Santa Claus does not exist, but they both have a change of heart after meeting a department store Father Christmas who claims to be the man himself. When the kindly fellow is accused of being a charlatan, his new friends engage a lawyer to prove his true identity. Remake of the 1947 family drama, with Richard Attenborough, Elizabeth Perkins, Mara Wilson and Dylan McDermott.(n)

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A boy has to fend for himself when he is accidentally left behind after his family jets off to Paris for Christmas. The youngster initially enjoys his freedom, but is soon forced to resort to ingenious booby traps to defend the family home from two dim-witted burglars. Comedy, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine O'Hara and John Candy.(n)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail obsessed with motor racing gets sucked into a car's exhaust pipe, and emerges having gained super-speed. This stroke of luck allows him to realise his dream of competing against human drivers in the prestigious Indianapolis 500 race. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Doubtfire
programme.desc: A struggling actor's ambitious, no-nonsense wife throws him out and demands a divorce. Desperate to spend time with his children, he puts his talents to good use by donning drag and posing as a Scottish housekeeper to get a job looking after them. Comedy, starring Robin Williams, Sally Field, Pierce Brosnan, Harvey Fierstein and Mara Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: In a fantasy world where a fairy godmother endows each newborn with a special attribute, baby Ella is given the unwelcome gift of obedience. While growing up, she is magically compelled to do anything she is told to, and her stepmother takes great delight in forcing the girl to obey her every whim. So Ella sets out on a quest to find her fairy godmother and get her to take back her unwanted birthright. Fantasy adventure, starring Anne Hathaway, Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes, Minnie Driver and Joanna Lumley.(n)

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller.(n)

programme.title: Wayne's World 2
programme.desc: Heavy metal fanatics Wayne and Garth try to stage a giant Woodstock-style rock festival, with a little help from a spaced-out British roadie and the ghost of Jim Morrison. But Wayne also has to stop his girlfriend leaving him for her slimy manager. Comedy sequel, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Ralph Brown, Kim Basinger, Tia Carrere and Christopher Walken.(n)

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman.(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum
programme.desc: A new nightwatchman at New York's Museum of Natural History discovers his job entails more than he bargained for. Fantasy comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Dick Van Dyke, Robin Williams, Carla Gugino and Ricky Gervais.(n)

programme.desc: A Hollywood director constructs a virtual-reality actress whose talents impress film fans all around the world - but as the adoring public becomes more and more fascinated, he resorts to increasingly desperate measures to maintain the deception that she is real. Satirical comedy, starring Al Pacino, Catherine Keener, Pruitt Taylor Vince, Jay Mohr and Jason Schwartzman.(n)

programme.desc: Three friends discover a camera that takes pictures of events that will happen 24 hours in the future. They conspire to use the device for material gain, but are disturbed to see some of the horrific events that lie ahead for them. Sci-fi thriller, starring Danielle Panabaker, Matt O'Leary and George Finn.(n)

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: An aspiring writer takes a caretaking job at a remote mountain hotel. It has closed for the winter, and he has been hired to get the place ready for the next season. But evil spirits haunting its corridors destroy his sanity, causing the unhinged author to rampage through the hotel and terrorise his wife and young son. Stanley Kubrick's horror, based on the Stephen King novel, with Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd and Scatman Crothers.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
programme.desc: Captain Kirk and the crew of the starship Enterprise are sent on a clandestine mission into enemy territory to track down the rogue starfleet agent behind a terrorist attack on Earth. programme.desc: A teenager investigates the murder of a neighbour, which leads him to discover evidence of black magic. programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: The infamous scientist's monster roams the Earth 200 years after burying his creator, and is drawn into an ancient supernatural conflict. Two factions of magical beings are at war, and the key to ending the conflict lies in tapping the secret of the creature's immortality. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Eckhart, Bill Nighy and Miranda Otto.(n)

programme.desc: A debauched old man makes a bizarre road trip across America to reunite his eight-year-old grandson with his real father. He takes the youngster through funerals, beauty pageants and biker bars and treats the people he meets to a display of his twisted approach to childcare. Hidden camera comedy, starring Johnny Knoxville and Jackson Nicoll.(n)

programme.desc: A con-woman acquires an executive's credit card numbers, and lives a life of luxury at his expense. Comedy, with Jason Bateman, Melissa McCarthy, Jon Favreau and Amanda Peet.(n)

As the dastardly interloper uses the gang's performances as cover for an international crime spree, the real Kermit is left languishing in a Russian prison. Comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Tina Fey and Ty Burrell.(n)
